articles.headline: CAR in Latin America
articles.summary: Carlos Subero, a Venezuelan journalist, introduced computer-assisted reporting (CAR) in his country with unique political analyses using SPSS software, inspiring other Latin American journalists.

articles.headline: Busted: Tracking bankruptcy
articles.summary: An investigation into bankruptcy abuse in Sweden reveals it as a tool for economic criminality, highlighting challenges in proving cases and detailing involved business networks.

articles.headline: Tax Investigation: Analyzing property tax
articles.summary: An economic analysis using CAR tools examined New Jersey's property tax burden in light of gubernatorial policies, revealing significant insights into tax and income dynamics.
